Package com.guardsquare.dexguard.runtime.detection

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DebugBlocker.OnAttackListener
    Interface to implement overriding its method onAttack() and passing on an object of the implementing class to the debugger blocking API, i.e., blockDebugger().
    RootDetector.Callback
    Callback to process the results of the root detection checks.
    RootDetector.InternalCallback
    Internal callback to process the results of the root detection checks.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CertificateChecker
    This class contains methods that checks whether the signature of the application is the expected signature.
    DebugBlocker
    This class provides a method to block native debuggers.
    DebugDetector
    This class provides a set of static methods enabling the detection of various debug related application states.
    DexGuardServiceIdentifier
    This class is used to identify whether the current process corresponds to the DexGuard root detection service
    EmulatorDetector
    The EmulatorDetector class bundles various emulator detection techniques.
    FileChecker
    This class contains methods that check whether files have been modified after DexGuard has packaged them.
    HookDetector
    This class contains a utility method to detect hooks in the runtime environment of the application, with frameworks like Frida.
    RootDetector
    This class detects whether the device on which it is running is rooted.
    RootDetectorService
    This class implements the Magisk-related checks as a service that is run in an isolated process.
    TamperDetector
    This class contains methods that check whether an APK has been modified after DexGuard has packaged it.
    Utf8EncodingUtils  
    VirtualEnvironmentDetector
    This class contains a method to detect if the application is being run inside a virtual environment, e.g., frameworks like VirtualXposed, Parallel Box, Multiple Accounts, etc.
